projects.name: Raytracer
projects.description: This raytracer creates images using monte carlo path tracing. Basic geometries (spheres, triangles, quads) are organized in a bounding volume hierachy and multiple threads handle rendering parts of the image. Built with C++20

projects.name: Planetary System Simulator
projects.description: Simulates a planetary system described in a csv file. User can click and see info about the planets and star. User can also edit planetary system information. Built using JavaFX 3D.

projects.name: RouteSafer
projects.description: First place winner of Hack the 6ix 2019, with 250+ participants. Using ML to analyse collision data, RouteSafer finds different routes between an origin and a destination and assigns a safety score to them. I made the frontend of the project using React and the Google Maps API

projects.name: Fourier Epicycles
projects.description: Draws a given relation using Fourier epicycles. A series of spinning lines each with their own length and frequency is animated and their sum over time is used to draw the original relation. Built using JavaFX.

projects.name: Coup
projects.description: A web version of the popular card game Coup. I implemented the Socket.IO backend and the game logic. Built using Node.js, Socket.IO, and React.

projects.name: Taboo
projects.description: A web version of the game Taboo. Has offline functionality. Built using React.

projects.name: POP!
projects.description: Flappy bird clone with original graphics by me. Built using PyGame.
